property.description: This beautiful beach home is perfect for anyone who loves being close to the water. This house is one of a kind with 5 bedrooms, 5 bath, and plenty of open space! It is located right on the beach of Lake Ouachita, Arkansas with a gorgeous view of the beach. The top floor includes a personal gym and a game room with an inside hot tub. This house also includes a wraparound porch and balcony on the top floor to lookout at beach. If you love the beach, you should definitely come visit this house!
property.outdoor: Solar panels, wrap around porch, balcony, and located right on the beach
property.typesOfRooms: Kitchen, living room, dining room, bathroom, bedroom, storage, game room, and gym
